rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Universe is the total membership or population of a defined class of people, objects or events
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Univers
Universe

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class DataFile, which is also a dcterms:Dataset, represents all the data files containing the microdata datasets.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fichier de données
Data file

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: It is recommended to use Dublin Core terms (identifier, description) and SKOS labels to describe the variable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Variable
Variable

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: CategoryStatistics pointing to categories and codes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Category statistics

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data discovery document in DDI. Dct:publisher is used for the agency.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Datenentdeckungsdokument
data discovery document

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The general kind of data (e.g., geospatial, register, survey) collected in this study, given either as a skos:Concept, or as a blank node with attached free-text rdfs:label.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kind of data

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Each study has a set of logical metadata associated with the processing of data, at the time of collection or later during cleaning, and re-coding. LogicalDataSet represents the microdata dataset.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ensemble de données
LogicalDataSet

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process collecting data is focusing on the analysis of a particular type of subject. If, for example, the adult population of Finland is being studied, the AnalysisUnit would be individuals or persons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Analyseeinheit
analysis unit

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SummaryStatistics pointing to variables and CategoryStatistics pointing to categories and codes are both descriptive statistics.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Statistique descriptive
Descriptive statistics

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The value true indicates that the dataset can be accessed (usually downloaded) by anyone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ist öffentlich
is public

rdf:Description.dc:title: DDI discovery model ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This ontology is based on the Data Documentation Initiative model, especially the elements useful for data discovery
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Franck Cotton
rdf:Description.dc:title: DDI-Entdeckungsontologie
Ontologie pour le modèle DDI discovery
